description: Creates a feeling of luxury and desire. Relies on smooth, gliding camera movements, perfect lighting, and sound design that emphasizes texture and quiet elegance.

visual.prompt_modifiers: luxury aesthetic, perfect lighting, smooth camera movements, high-end production values, elegant composition

audio.music_palette: ambient luxury, subtle classical elements, refined instrumental
audio.sfx_palette: textile sounds, gentle footsteps, ambient room tone, texture emphasis

scenes.llm_prompt_for_script: Set an aspirational tone by introducing the {luxury_subject} or {showcase_theme}. Focus on exclusivity, craftsmanship, and the elevated experience that awaits.

generative_video_prompts.prompt: Elegant establishing shot of {luxury_subject}. Smooth, gliding camera movement revealing the space or product in perfect lighting. Every detail suggests quality and sophistication. {global_visual_modifiers}

music_cue.dynamic: Gentle, sophisticated opening that sets a refined mood

sfx.description: Subtle ambient sound - soft fabric rustling, gentle footsteps, or quiet luxury environment sounds

scenes.llm_prompt_for_script: Highlight the exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail. Discuss {craftsmanship_element_1} and {craftsmanship_element_2}. Emphasize the human touch and artistic skill involved.

generative_video_prompts.prompt: Extreme close-up shots of {craftsmanship_element_1}. Show texture, stitching, grain, or fine details. Lighting emphasizes the quality and precision of the work. {global_visual_modifiers}
Artisan hands working on {craftsmanship_element_2}. Slow, deliberate movements showing skill and care. Tools and materials suggest premium quality. {global_visual_modifiers}

music_cue.dynamic: Builds appreciation for artistry and skill

sfx.description: Gentle crafting sounds - leather working, fabric handling, or tool use
Subtle workspace sounds that emphasize precision and care

scenes.llm_prompt_for_script: Show how {luxury_subject} integrates into an elevated lifestyle. Present {lifestyle_scenario_1} and {lifestyle_scenario_2}. Focus on the emotional benefits and status enhancement.

generative_video_prompts.prompt: Elegant lifestyle scene featuring {lifestyle_scenario_1}. Beautiful people in refined settings enjoying {luxury_subject}. Perfect lighting and composition suggest aspiration. {global_visual_modifiers}
Second lifestyle scenario: {lifestyle_scenario_2}. Show versatility and different ways the luxury fits into sophisticated living. {global_visual_modifiers}

music_cue.dynamic: Emotional connection, suggests aspiration and achievement

sfx.description: Elegant environmental sounds - wine pouring, soft conversation, refined ambiance
Luxurious texture sounds - silk, cashmere, or premium materials

scenes.llm_prompt_for_script: Share the heritage story behind {luxury_subject}. Discuss {heritage_element} and {tradition_aspect}. Connect past mastery with present excellence.

generative_video_prompts.prompt: Historical or heritage imagery related to {heritage_element}. Vintage photos, traditional techniques, or founding moments. Sepia tones or classic presentation. {global_visual_modifiers}
Modern interpretation of traditional {tradition_aspect}. Show how heritage informs contemporary excellence. Bridge between past and present. {global_visual_modifiers}

music_cue.dynamic: Reverent, respectful of tradition while looking forward

sfx.description: Subtle historical ambiance - pages turning, old workshop sounds

scenes.llm_prompt_for_script: Extend an exclusive invitation to experience {luxury_subject}. Use language that suggests membership in an elite group. Reference {exclusive_offer} or {contact_method}.

generative_video_prompts.prompt: Final beauty shot of {luxury_subject} in perfect presentation. Lighting and composition suggest ultimate desirability. Logo or brand mark elegantly integrated. {global_visual_modifiers}

music_cue.dynamic: Confident, inviting conclusion that suggests exclusivity
